description: This is a test specification file for the GameComponent in an Angular project, utilizing Jasmine for testing. It sets up the test environment and verifies that the component can be instantiated successfully.

classes.name: GameComponent
classes.description: The component under test, representing the game logic and UI for the tic-tac-toe game.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Sets up the testing module before each test, importing the GameComponent.

methods.name: it
methods.description: Defines an individual test case that checks if the GameComponent can be created successfully.
